title: Strengthening Data Science Competencies: ADDIE Model for Enhancing Secondary Computer Science Education Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: A secondary computer science education design plan can be developed by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model
At least two quantitative and qualitative evaluation tools can be designed for analyzing learning effectiveness
Three or more strategies for managing large-scale learners in mobile microlearning environments can be proposed
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
